content.text: Match ends, South China 1, Juventus 2.
Second Half ends, South China 1, Juventus 2.
Goal!  South China 1, Juventus 2. Lorenzo Rosseti (Juventus) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box to the bottom right corner.
Substitution, South China. Lai Yiu Cheong replaces Muhama` Awal.
Substitution, South China. Lau Cheuk Hin replaces Siu-Ki Chan.
Carlos Blanco (Juventus) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Substitution, South China. Che Runqiu replaces Chak Ting Fung.
Substitution, South China. Chu Siu Kei replaces Sean Tse.
Substitution, South China. Kwun Chung Leung replaces Andy Russell.
Substitution, South China. Hok Hei Lam replaces Ryan Griffiths.
Substitution, Juventus. Yoan Severin replaces Daniele Rugani.
Substitution, Juventus. Stefano Padovan replaces Paulo Dybala.
Substitution, Juventus. Luca Coccolo replaces Alex Sandro.
Substitution, Juventus. Carlos Blanco replaces Hernanes.
Substitution, Juventus. Giulio Parodi replaces Roberto Pereyra.
Substitution, South China. Leung Nok Hang replaces Kin Fung Cheung.
Substitution, South China. Siu Kwan Chan replaces Wisdom Fofo Agbo.
Substitution, Juventus. Emil Audero replaces Neto.
Substitution, Juventus. Luca Marrone replaces Medhi Benatia.
Substitution, Juventus. Lorenzo Rosseti replaces Alberto Cerri.
Substitution, Juventus. Mattia Vitale replaces Miralem Pjanic.
Substitution, South China. Law Hiu Chung replaces Luiz Carlos.
Substitution, South China. Christian Mora replaces Man Fai Tsang.
Second Half begins South China 1, Juventus 1.
First Half ends, South China 1, Juventus 1.
Siu-Ki Chan (South China) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Chak Ting Fung (South China) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Goal!  South China 1, Juventus 1. Medhi Benatia (Juventus) right footed shot from very close range to the bottom left corner.
Goal!  South China 1, Juventus 0. Siu-Ki Chan (South China) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
